mapper.sql: SELECT c.name AS name, d.full_name AS department_name, c.department_id AS department_id, c.id AS club_id, COUNT(uc.user_id) AS member_count, c.state AS state, c.is_deleted AS is_deleted, CASE WHEN uc.role & 2 THEN u.name ELSE NULL END AS manager FROM tbl_club c LEFT JOIN tbl_user_club uc ON c.id = uc.club_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_department d ON c.department_id = d.id
